1001.name: Time Backflow: Restore
1001.desc: Restores Mods' Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace) to the maximum when they enter Modified Mode.

1002.name: Time Backflow: Reading
1002.desc: Restores Mods' Combat Resources (Rage, Energy, Traces, Divine Grace) to the maximum after they exit Modified Mode.

1003.name: Momentum Shift: Combat Resources
1003.desc: Mods gain Combat Resources based on the resources they use: 30 Divine Grace/Energy/Rage, or 1 Trace when they enter the battle.

1004.name: Momentum Shift: Ultimate Skill
1004.desc: Increases Mods' Ultimate Skill charge speed by 100% for the first 10 seconds of the battle.

1005.name: Momentum Shift: Aether Code
1005.desc: Modifying Level reaches S-Grade instantly after Mods gain Modifying Rating for the first time.

1006.name: Momentum Shift: Insulate
1006.desc: Mods gain Super Armor for the first 15 seconds of the battle.

1007.name: Momentum Shift: Siphon
1007.desc: Restores 5% of a Mod's max HP when they cast an Ultimate Skill.

2006.name: Perfect Flow: Rage
2006.desc: Increases Rage charge speed of Rage Mods by 100% for 10 seconds after they trigger Dodge effects.

2007.name: Perfect Flow: Recharge
2007.desc: Energy Mods gain 50 Energy after they trigger Dodge effects.

2008.name: Perfect Flow: Return
2008.desc: When a Trace Mod triggers the Dodge effect, they will regain all spent Traces the next time they cast a Trace Skill.

2009.name: Perfect Flow: Patch
2009.desc: Divine Grace Mods gain 50 Divine Grace after they trigger Dodge effects.

2010.name: Perfect Flow: Fission
2010.desc: Resets a Mod's Skill 3 cooldown after they trigger Dodge effects.

3004.name: Fusion Reaction
3004.desc: Increases Mods' Ultimate Skill charge speed by 30%.

3005.name: Entropy Spread
3005.desc: Increases Mods' Rage charge speed by 50%.

3006.name: Mass-Energy Swap
3006.desc: Increases Mods' Energy charge speed by 50%.

3007.name: Aether Tide
3007.desc: Increases Mods' Divine Grace charge speed by 50%.

3008.name: Super Algorithms
3008.desc: Mods have a 50% chance of getting an additional Trace when obtaining Traces.

3009.name: Spectral Scattering
3009.desc: Increases Healing effects Mods receive by 25%.

3011.name: Superconducting Resonance
3011.desc: Increases Mods' Dodge Energy charge speed by 50%.

3012.name: Rapid Supercomputing
3012.desc: Restores 3% of every Mod's max HP after a Mod triggers Dodge effects.

3013.name: Instant Simulation
3013.desc: Randomly resets one of the Mod's skill in cooldown after they cast an Ultimate Skill.

4001.name: Spiral Filter
4001.desc: Increases Modifying Level charge speed by 30%.

4003.name: Time Backflow: Update
4003.desc: Restores Mods' Ultimate Skill charge to the maximum when they enter Modified Mode.

4004.name: Time Backflow: Reset
4004.desc: Resets Mods' all skill and Ultimate Skill cooldowns when they enter Modified Mode.

4005.name: Time Backflow: Sync
4005.desc: Resets Mods' all skill and Ultimate Skill cooldowns after they exit Modified Mode.

4006.name: Time Backflow: Recover
4006.desc: Restores 10% of Mods max HP when they enter Modified Mode.

4007.name: Time Backflow: Release
4007.desc: Restores Mods' HP by the percentage of the enemy's max HP lowered in Modified Mode after they exit Modified Mode.

4008.name: Time Backflow: Redrive
4008.desc: Extends the duration of Modified Mode by 6 seconds.

4009.name: Time Backflow: Archive
4009.desc: Deals DMG to an enemy equal to 20% of the DMG they take in Modified Mode after Mods exit Modified Mode.

4010.name: Perfect Flow: Leapfrog
4010.desc: Modifying Level reaches Ω-Grade instantly after a Mod triggers Dodge effects.

4011.name: Perfect Flow: Ripple
4011.desc: Increases the charge speed of a Mod's Charge skills by 40% till the end of battle after they trigger Dodge effects; stacks up to 3 times.

4012.name: Photic Leap: Power
4012.desc: Reduces Rage Mods' Rage cost for skills by 30%.

4013.name: Photic Leap: Extreme Speed
4013.desc: Rage Mods gain 3 Rage every second.

4014.name: Photic Leap: EM Storm
4014.desc: Increases Energy charge speed of Energy Mods by 30%.

4015.name: Photic Leap: Erosion
4015.desc: Reduces Energy Mods' Energy cost for skills by 30%.

4016.name: Photic Leap: Threshold
4016.desc: Trace Mods gain 1 extra Trace when they trigger Interruption Refund; triggers only once every 7 seconds.

4017.name: Photic Leap: Bestow
4017.desc: Trace Mods regain one of the Traces when they are consumed; triggers only once every 7 seconds.

4018.name: Photic Leap: Rolling Thunder
4018.desc: Increases Divine Grace charge speed of Divine Grace Mods by 30%.

4019.name: Photic Leap: Inscription
4019.desc: Restores HP equal to 30% of a Mod's ATK when their Divine Grace reaches the maximum, triggers only once every 6 seconds.
